query: SELECT id, status, podcast_audio_url IS NOT NULL as has_audio, podcast_scripts IS NOT NULL as has_scripts, LENGTH(podcast_scripts) as scripts_length FROM podcast_tasks WHERE user_id = 1 AND status = 'completed' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user LtHxqrZriiUHME1.0a62a726ab17 --database kf362K9uEYqJammqLrrUaT --execute SELECT id, status, podcast_audio_url IS NOT NULL as has_audio, podcast_scripts IS NOT NULL as has_scripts, LENGTH(podcast_scripts) as scripts_length FROM podcast_tasks WHERE user_id = 1 AND status = 'completed' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1;
